metadata.title: CVE-2019-10163 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A Vulnerability has been found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server before versions 4.1.9, 4.0.8 allowing a remote, authorized master server to cause a high CPU load or even prevent any further updates to any slave zone by sending a large number of NOTIFY messages. Note that only servers configured as slaves are affected by this issue.

criterions.comment: pdns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.6-3build1').
